TEXT.TITLE: GTE <GTE> UNIT SIGNS DEAL WITH SKYSWITCH
TEXT.BODY: <Skyswitch Satellite Communications Co> said it GTE Corp's GTE Spacenet has signed an original equipment manufacturing agreement with Skyswitch that will enable the two companies to set the standard for satellite news gathering voice communications systems. The equipment will be provided under GTE's specifications and label, it said. Reuter
